text: Student Council President
Motion

Ah... I've heard some good stories.
Reporter Komiya, Reporter Morino...!
Yes! Chief Editor Arisugawa!

Hehe...
Will it all fit on the pages, I wonder...?

We've got some great photos too...
It's up to the reporters' skills how to put it all together.

Now, next is...
the student council room.

Today, we went around checking out
the cultural clubs' activities, right?

Yes!
Everyone was amazing...!

I was surprised to hear their stories.
Every club is so passionate.

Yes...! They even invite experts and alumni
to teach and make efforts in teaching methods.

They not only focus on achieving results but also
value each individual's goals and objectives.

But that attitude seems to ultimately lead to
bigger stages and opportunities...!
I hope so too!
Motion

That painting... is it from...
the art club...?

Yes, that's right. It belongs to the current vice president of the art club.
We're displaying the piece she won an award for in her first year.
Her first year...?

She's the one on the cover this time.
I'm looking forward to it too.
Motion

Well then...
it's about time for... the photos...

...?
Aren't you guys going to be in the photos?

Yes!
We're reporters!
Alright... Here I go...
